text: James Lankford (born March 4, 1968) is the senior United States Senator from Oklahoma. He is a member of the U.S. Republican Party and has been in the Senate since January 3, 2015. He was in the United States House of Representatives from 2011 to 2015. Lankford was born on March 4, 1968 in Dallas, Texas. He studied at University of Texas, Austin and at Southwestern Baptist Theological Seminary. He is married to Cindy Lankford. They have two children. ==References== ==Other websites== * * James Lankford, U.S. Senator for Oklahoma, Home Page Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Dallas Category:United States representatives from Oklahoma Category:United States senators from Oklahoma Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: James Lankford
